About the Company: DSJ Communications Ltd which was earlier known as Dalal Street Communications is engaged in the business of communications that is journals, directories, using radio and TV. It is mainly catering and dealing with stock market conditions. It also publishes India Economic Update, a monthly magazine, from Dubai, targeted at NRIs. A new publication, E2, was launched for distribution to Citibank cardholders. The TV division is in the process of developing and marketing software to various channels including India TV. DSJ Radio has taken off with a regular evening news-and-views bulletin about daily stock market condition
